reviewText: Lots of great tips and tricks. Viewer must have good basic stitching skills as these are not covered in the DVD. I needed a good fat suit (mostly torso) for Buttercup in HMS Pinafore. Very happy with the results. Was able to add about 10" in bust, waist and hip measurements without making the fat suit too heavy. Didn't add to the legs as she is wearing a full skirt.
